title: 3PM
content:
Health Updates: birchbark for metabolic conditions; prenatal care; multi-vitamins benefit following breast cancer... <!--more--> therapy; low-fat lupin proteins replace high-fat animal products; man assaulted & arrested after questioning Dr OZ on vaccine safety & adverse reactions; alpha-lipoic acid, antioxidants prevent damage to mitochondria.
Commentary on poverty in America.
Prof William Black is an Associate Professor of Economics and Law at the University of Missouri in Kansas City where he specializes in financial fraud & white collar crime.
Bill was the litigation director of the Federal Home Loan Bank Board and served as the deputy director of the National Commission on Financial Institution Reform.
   He was  a key player in exposing the Keating Five during the S&L scandals.
“The Best Way to Rob a Bank is to Own One: How Corporate Executives and Politicians Looted the S&L Industry” Financial bank fraud, “liar loans” and why banking executives are immune from prosecution.
